So....i tried to play , "matchmaking accepted" , i waited for the start....and waited...and waited... and finaly.

"you can't join the match , you received 24 hours ban".

WHY THE FUCK did it not join ? i checked , my ping was correct , my game was correct , WHY DID DEV DOES THAT ... WHY WHEN YOU CAN'T JOIN A MATCH YOU GET BANNED , i understand the fact than if you leave a game you get banned but...WHY IF YOU CAN'T EVEN JOIN IT U'RE BANNED ? WHY DO YOU SUCK ? god dmamnit. you rlly suck. that's all. now i got 24 hours.

Für mich der beste 5 vs 5 oder 2 vs 2 Shooter.
Leider ist das Spiel fast unspielbar geworden aufgrund der Cheater und der Community.
Finde es seitens Valve schwach, dass hier nichts unternommen wird.
Und ich frage mich warum man überhaupt cheaten muss, das werde ich aber wohl nie verstehen!
